name: Slideshow Wp
author: aumsrini

sections.description:
RESPONSIVE SLIDESHOW SLIDER AND CAROUSEL PLUGIN

Slideshow WP is 100% responsive and compatible with mobile, tablets, desktop computers and all modern web browsers which include i Phone, i Pad, Android, Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Opera.

You can insert this slide show slider to any Word Press post or pages. You can insert unlimited sliders to the post or pages as you wish. Every slider can be configured with individual parameters.

All front end interface elements are highly customizable. For upload of the image you can use build in images manager with advanced functionality for upload, sorting and customizing of the slider images.

An Easy to use slide show slider plug-in which help you to include multiple sliders in your wordpress website or blog. Slideshow wp can be on your header, sidebar as widget or widget slider in footer or anywhere in your posts or pages.

If you need more features Upgrade Pro Version at very low cost.

We have created a light and user-friendly slider. Responsive back-end design will help to add images and create slides in minutes. The usage of the slide show wp plugin is very easy, what you need is just to copy and paste the short-code of the slider into the Word Press post or page, there is no need to deal with any codes.

Slideshow WP is designed for everyone who wants to have the most stunning and attractive responsive slider .

Slideshow WP is fully responsive and mobile friendly. All your images will appear as beautiful sliders on your Word Press website. You may add unlimited slides , setup arrows, and make further customizations with the Pro version of the plugin. You can use short-codes with multiple word press plugins.slider slider has been tested with WordPress plugins and themes.

You can use slide show slider plug-ins as carousel slide show,thumbnail slide show,logo slide show,portfolio slide show,testimonial slide show and more.

Slideshow WP – is the free and most modern mobile touch slider with hardware accelerated transitions and amazing native behavior. It is intended to be used in mobile websites, mobile web apps, and mobile native/hybrid apps. Designed mostly for iOS, but also works great on latest Android, Windows Phone 8 and modern Desktop browsers.

Slider Lite Version Features:

  • Full Navigation Control
  • Most Flexible Slides
  • Full touch and swipe
  • Create Unlimited Sliders
  • 2 Types Slider(Fullwidth and Carousel)
  • Sort Slides
  • Slide Title
  • Slide description
  • Auto generated shortcode(just copy and paste anywhere)
  • Run multiple slides in same page.
  • Free Mail Support

If you need more features Upgrade Pro Version at very low cost.

Pro Version Features

  • 2 in slider (Images and Posts)

  • Post category

  • Post ordered by date,title,random

  • Number of posts to show

Settings

  • Enable/Disable Title

  • Title Background Color

  • Title Text Color

  • Enable/Disable Autoplay

  • 3 Animation

  • Animation Speed

  • Keyboard Control

  • 5 Navigation Icons

  • Navigation color
sections.installation:
1. Upload slideshow-wp.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [sswp-slide sswpid=1] in your posts or page OR
  4. Place <?php echo do_shortcode('[sswp-slide sswpid=1]');?> in your templates
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload slideshow-wp.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [sswp-slide sswpid=1] in your posts or page OR
  4. Place <?php echo do_shortcode('[sswp-slide sswpid=1]');?> in your templates

Is it responsive slider?

Yes,Slideshow Slider is a fully responsive.

Can i create unlimited slides ?

Yes,you can create unlimited slides .

Can i use it for multi domains ?

Yes,you can use Slideshow Slider on multisites without any restriction .

Can you provide support ?

Yes,we can provide support through mail.You can mail here Support.

short_description: Slide-show WP Is a responsive slider with touch and swipe slider. Slideshow WP supports two types of slider like full width and carousel.
